name: Disc 11
description: A dedicated open-source Discord music bot for Zhycorp based on Jukebox, easy to use, and with no coding required.

CONFIG_EMBED_COLOR.description: The color for your bot's embed message (hex code without hashtag)

CONFIG_OWNERS.description: A Discord ID, use comma if you want to add more than 1 owner (DO NOT ADD SOMEONE ELSE'S ID THAT YOU DON'T TRUST)

CONFIG_YOUTUBE_DATA_STRATEGY.description: Strategy for getting video info from youtube (scrape or api, default: scrape)

SECRET_YT_API_KEY.description: Your YouTube API v3 key for retrieving video infotmation from YouTube if CONFIG_YOUTUBE_DATA_STRATEGY is set to api

CONFIG_TOTALSHARDS.description: Total shards to spawn, use "auto" or a number (default: auto)

CONFIG_DISABLE_SONG_SELECTION.description: Whether to disable selecting music on play command, this will automatically selects the first order from search results (default: no)

CONFIG_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum music to list in song selection (default: 10, max: 10)

CONFIG_SELECT_TIMEOUT.description: Music selection timeout when searching (default: 20 <20 seconds>)

CONFIG_ALLOW_DUPLICATE.description: Whether to allow users to add duplicate of music (yes or no, default: no)

CONFIG_DELETE_QUEUE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds before queue is deleted when no one is in the voice channel (default: 180 <3 minutes>)

CONFIG_CACHE_YOUTUBE_DOWNLOADS.description: Whether to download and cache music from YouTube (yes or no, default: no)

CONFIG_CACHE_MAX_LENGTH.description: Max music length in seconds that are allowed to be cached (default: 5400 <1 hour 30 minutes>)

CONFIG_DISABLE_INVITE_CMD.description: Whether to disable the invite command or not (default: no)

CONFIG_DEBUG.description: Should logging use debug level? Please note that this is not recommended in production (default: no)

CONFIG_FETCH_ALL_USERS.description: Whether to fetch all users on startup (default: no) (warning: increased memory usage especially for bots with large users). NOTE: You need to enable privileged GUILD_MEMBERS Intents on the developer page)

CONFIG_STATUS_TYPE.description: What type of status does the bot use? (playing, listening, or watching, default: listening)

CONFIG_STATUS_ACTIVITY.description: What status does the bot display? (default: "music on {guildsCount} servers") (available variables: guildsCount, usersCount, playingCount, and botPrefix). NOTE ON {usersCount} VARIABLE: This only displays cached usersCount, to get full usersCount, please enable CONFIG_FETCH_ALL_USERS
